AT.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: Team Oger greift an!
AT.description: „Kickt solange ihr es noch könnt!“ heißt es in Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Oger greift an! für die Systeme der Nintendo 3DS-Familie. Denn die Zukunft des Fußballs ist in höchster Gefahr. Aber noch können die Spieler eine triste Welt ohne Kickerspaß verhindern - wenn sie mit ganzer Kraft vorwärts stürmen. Der legendäre Mark Evans und sein Inazuma Nationalteam kämpfen darin um den Sieg in den Frontier International Championships. Zugleich müssen sie es mit einem futuristischen Gegner aufnehmen, der in der Zeit zurück gereist ist, um alle Fußballspiele für immer abzupfeifen. 80 Jahre in der Zukunft trifft Mark Evans' Urenkel Canon Evans auf das Team Oger. Die Truppe soll in die Vergangenheit reisen, das Inazuma Team in der Arena besiegen und damit den Lauf der Geschichte ändern. Das heißt: Es soll eine Welt erschaffen werden, in der es keinen Fußball mehr gibt. Um diesen furchtbaren Plan zu durchkreuzen, muss Canon mit Mark Kontakt aufnehmen. Vielleicht können sie gemeinsam das Schicksal ihres Sports doch noch zum Guten wenden - und zugleich dafür sorgen, dass Mark und seine Elf auf Kurs bleiben und als bestes Fußballteam der Welt ausgezeichnet werden. Tor! Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Oger greift an! ist ein aufregender Mix aus RPG-Action und Fußball - exklusiv für Nintendo 3DS!

BG.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: Team Ogre Attacks!
BG.description: Lace up those boots and get ready to take to the field in Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks on Nintendo 3DS family systems! This time, Mark Evans and the rest of the Inazuma National team face the tall order of reigning supreme in the Frontier International Championships – and they also have to deal with a futuristic enemy that has travelled back in time to threaten the very existence of football! 80 years in the future, Mark Evans’ great-grandson Canon Evans encounters Team Ogre, who plan to travel back 80 years and defeat Inazuma National on the football field to change the course of history, which in their evil minds means creating a world without football! In order to foil these potentially devastating plans, Canon must come face to face with Mark so that they can work together to preserve the fate of the beautiful game, all while ensuring that Inazuma National remains on course to be crowned the greatest football team in the world. Goal! Dive in to Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks!, an exciting blend of RPG action and football exclusive to Nintendo 3DS!

BE.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3 : Les Ogres attaquent !
BE.description: Chaussez vos crampons et préparez-vous à investir le terrain dans Inazuma Eleven 3: Les Ogres attaquent ! sur les consoles de la famille Nintendo 3DS à partir du 14 février ! Dans ce nouvel opus de cette célèbre série de RPG footballistiques, Mark Evans et le reste de l’équipe Inazuma National doivent réussir l’exploit de sortir vainqueurs du Championnat Frontier International, tout en contrecarrant les projets d’un terrible ennemi, venu du futur pour éradiquer l’existence même du football ! 80 ans dans le futur, Canon Evans, l’arrière-petit-fils de Mark Evans, suit du regard une escouade redoutable, la Team Ogre, qui projette de voyager 80 ans dans le passé pour vaincre, sur le terrain, l’Inazuma National. Ce faisant, ils pensent changer le cours de l’Histoire et créer un monde dans lequel le football n’existe plus… Pour déjouer ce plan maléfique, Canon va devoir prévenir Mark et lui prêter main-forte afin d’assurer l’avenir du plus populaire des sports, tout en veillant à ce que l’équipe de Mark et de ses amis soit couronnée la meilleure du monde ! But !!! Inazuma Eleven 3: Les Ogres attaquent ! mélange RPG et football en exclusivité sur Nintendo 3DS !

Goal! Dive in to Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks!, an exciting blend of RPG action and football exclusive to Nintendo 3DS!

NL.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: Team Ogre Attacks!
NL.description: Bereid je voor om het veld te betreden in Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks! voor de Nintendo 3DS-systemen. In dit nieuwste deel moeten Mark Evans en de rest van het Inazuma National-team proberen te zegevieren in de Frontier International Championships, waarbij ze gehinderd worden door een futuristische vijand die terug in de tijd is gereisd om het bestaan van voetbal zelf te bedreigen! 80 Jaar in de toekomst ontmoet de achterkleinzoon van Mark Evans, Canon Evans, Team Ogre. Het wordt al snel duidelijk dat deze eenheid deel uitmaakt van een plot om 80 jaar terug in de tijd te reizen en Inazuma National op het voetbalveld te verslaan. Op die manier wil Team Ogre de loop van de geschiedenis veranderen en een wereld zonder voetbal scheppen. Om deze potentieel vernietigende plannen te dwarsbomen, moet Canon op zoek gaan naar Mark en met hem samenwerken om hun mooie sport voor de ondergang te behoeden. Ondertussen proberen Mark en zijn vrienden natuurlijk ook op koers te blijven om tot het beste voetbalteam ter wereld gekroond te worden. Neem het op tegen een futuristische vijand die voetbal in Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks!, alleen voor Nintendo 3DS-systemen!

PL.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: Team Ogre Attacks!
PL.description: Lace up those boots and get ready to take to the field in Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks on Nintendo 3DS family systems! This time, Mark Evans and the rest of the Inazuma National team face the tall order of reigning supreme in the Frontier International Championships – and they also have to deal with a futuristic enemy that has travelled back in time to threaten the very existence of football! 80 years in the future, Mark Evans’ great-grandson Canon Evans encounters Team Ogre, who plan to travel back 80 years and defeat Inazuma National on the football field to change the course of history, which in their evil minds means creating a world without football! In order to foil these potentially devastating plans, Canon must come face to face with Mark so that they can work together to preserve the fate of the beautiful game, all while ensuring that Inazuma National remains on course to be crowned the greatest football team in the world. Goal! Dive in to Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks!, an exciting blend of RPG action and football exclusive to Nintendo 3DS!

PT.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: Team Ogre Attacks!
PT.description: Em Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks para a Nintendo 3DS, Mark Evans e o resto da equipa da Inazuma National devem tentar vencer os Frontier International Championships e dominar um inimigo futurista que viaja no tempo para ameaçar a própria existência do futebol! A história de Team Ogre Attacks! começa no futuro, 80 anos mais tarde, com o bisneto de Mark Evans a observar um grupo de tropas de elite enquanto estas marcham ao longo de uma rua. Desde logo se percebe que esta formidável unidade, a Team Ogre, faz parte de uma conspiração que envolve viajar no tempo e derrotar a equipa de futebol Inazuma National com o objetivo de alterar o rumo da História. Os maquiavélicos planos da Team Ogre passam por criar um mundo sem futebol e para a impedir de os levar a cabo, Canon Evans deve unir-se ao seu bisavô Mark para, em conjunto, tentarem preservar o destino do desporto-rei. Tudo isto, claro, garantindo que a Inazuma National é sagrada a melhor equipa de futebol do mundo! Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks! traz para a Nintendo 3DS uma emocionante combinação de ação de RPG e futebol.

RU.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: Team Ogre Attacks!
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Зашнуровывайте бутсы и готовьтесь выйти на поле в игре Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks для линейки систем Nintendo 3DS! В этот раз Марк Эванс и остальные игроки национальной сборной Inazuma столкнутся с непростой задачей победить в играх Frontier International Championships, одолев футуристического противника, который прибыл из будущего и угрожает существованию самого футбола! Сюжет игры перенесет вас на 80 лет вперед, где Кэнон Эванс, который приходится Марку правнуком, столкнется с грозным отрядом Team Ogre, который намерен перенестись на 80 лет назад, разгромить национальную сборную Inazuma в футбольном матче и изменить ход истории, коварно создав мир без футбола. Чтобы не дать этим разрушительным планам воплотиться в жизнь, Кэнон должен увидеться с Марком и победить в состязании, на кону которого судьба замечательной игры. А заодно Марк и его товарищи заслуженно станут величаться лучшими футболистами в мире. Гол! Вас ждет Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks!, уникальное сочетание ролевой игры и футбола, только на Nintendo 3DS!

SE.name: Inazuma Eleven® 3: Team Ogre Attacks!
SE.description: Lace up those boots and get ready to take to the field in Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks on Nintendo 3DS family systems! This time, Mark Evans and the rest of the Inazuma National team face the tall order of reigning supreme in the Frontier International Championships – and they also have to deal with a futuristic enemy that has travelled back in time to threaten the very existence of football! 80 years in the future, Mark Evans’ great-grandson Canon Evans encounters Team Ogre, who plan to travel back 80 years and defeat Inazuma National on the football field to change the course of history, which in their evil minds means creating a world without football! In order to foil these potentially devastating plans, Canon must come face to face with Mark so that they can work together to preserve the fate of the beautiful game, all while ensuring that Inazuma National remains on course to be crowned the greatest football team in the world. Goal! Dive in to Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks!, an exciting blend of RPG action and football exclusive to Nintendo 3DS!
